creator: calestyo@scientia.net
text:
Hi.

It should be clarified, that:
1) SERVER_NAME is not necessarily equal to what is set via ServerName.
It seems that it is actually the same as HTTP_HOST, and can therefore be also a ServerAlias name.
(IMHO that's quite important to know).

(Better would even be, to change that,.. but I guess it would break many setups now, wouldn't it?)

2) It might be worth noting, that SERVER_PROTOCOL is not just e.g. "http" or "https"


Cheers,
Chris.
